body_html: Catch2 reruns through a TEST_CASE from the top down to a particular section for each section, so putting it at the start of the TEST_CASE would set the seed for every section. A TEST_CASE is effectively a fixture
body_text: Catch2 reruns through a TEST_CASE from the top down to a particular section for each section, so putting it at the start of the TEST_CASE would set the seed for every section. A TEST_CASE is effectively a fixture
body: Catch2 reruns through a `TEST_CASE` from the top down to a particular section for each section, so putting it at the start of the `TEST_CASE` would set the seed for every section. A `TEST_CASE` is effectively a fixture
